title: Persons of Interest in Robbery (F&V), 600 b/o Newton Pl, NW, on July 20, 2021
author: OfficialDCPolice
comment: Is the guy in the orange shorts with the pit trying to help the lady or is he an accomplice? If he was helping, why not use the dog? Sorry for the lady that wasn't necessary.
description:
The Metropolitan Police Department seeks the public's assistance in identifying two persons of interest in reference to a Robbery (Force & Violence) incident which occurred in the 600 block of Newton Street, NW, on Tuesday, July 20, 2021, at approximately 8:28 PM. The subjects were captured by a nearby surveillance camera.

DO YOUR PART TO HELP PREVENT AND SOLVE CRIME. Crime Solvers of Washington, DC currently offers a reward of up to $1,000 to anyone who provides information that leads to the arrest and indictment of the person or persons responsible for a crime committed in the District of Columbia. Your assistance is appreciated by your community. Ref.: CCN #21-100-546

Anyone who can identify these individuals or who has knowledge of this incident should take no action but call police at (202) 727-9099 or text your tip to the Department's TEXT TIP LINE to 50411.

To learn more about the MPD Rewards program, please visit www.mpdc.dc.gov/rewards.
